data.title: Hummer vs Helicopter Battle [2 Player] *Finished* (Now for Windows & Linux)
meta_keywords: Blender 3D Computer Graphics Animation Modeling Texturing Gameengine multimedia Rendering Raytracing art artists
data.text:
Youtube trailer now available - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=InxuapWWY7A

You might remember my old ‘WIP’ thread for this game.

Ive been busy lately with other projects, but have recently had time to add new features and fix all the bugs, and now i think i can finally call it finished. Its also about time I moved on and finished some other projects.

The game is simple. One player takes control of a Hummer, the other takes control of a Helicopter. Then you can fight it out.

Heres a couple of screens:

And heres some of the fixes and new features ive added:

Fixed the glitch when the helicopter is destroyed (game no longer crashes)

The hummer can now be destroyed also (with debris etc)

Added fuel for each vehicle (helicopter uses it up faster)

Added refueling stations for each vehicle (landing pad for helicopter, garage for Hummer)

Added a warning flash when fuel reaches a critical level

Weapons can now overheat (limiting use)

Helicopter has a shield over its landing pad, which activates on landing (protecting the helicopter as it refuels)

A shield generator for the landing pad (can be destroyed, leaving the helicopter vulnerable while refueling)

Added a small city, for the hummer to drive around and hide in

Added a defense point counter for the Hummer, this activates a cannon in the city which can help defend the hummer

Fuel, health and defense point boxes spawn randomly in the sky and fall to the ground to be collected

Limited the use of the hummer ‘flipper’ (can only be used after the hummer has been on its back for a certain amount of time)

Updated the levels terrain, with surrounding mountains etc

Added extra camera views for the garage and landing pad

Collisions between players results in losing health

Flashing light on the helicopter :eyebrowlift2:

A LOT of tweaking and editing to get everything in the game working well

And much, much, much more (i cant remember everything atm)

Game Downloads:

Windows .exe here (8mb) http://www.box.net/shared/t5caf8tgkw

Linux port (By Kernal_Script) http://www.mediafire.com/?ylnym0m2n2t (Updated, with no sound?)

Some tips, credits and controls are all available in-game (press H at any time to view controls)

I might fix up some errors if anyone finds anything really bad, but ive done a lot of testing with friends etc. All the major errors have been sorted out.

So thats it! Im quite happy with it, ive played (‘tested’) it for hours with friends and brother and its great fun.

I also have an action packed youtube video demonstration of the game coming soon.

Enjoy!!

Yeh everyone seems to lose the landing pad! You just have to look for the 4 buildings, which are all situated around it. After playing for a while you get to know where it is all the time, its just part of the challenge :yes:

Perhaps ill update it and make the heli pad a bit higher though, it seems to disappear down the hill, you cant see it from the city…

Im working on getting a linux executable, ill probubly make one at uni tomorrow.

Im not so worried about people cracking it, or all that GPL stuff (where exactly can i see all that ‘being obliged by blender to publish the .blend’ stuff???) Id be interested to see where that came from.

Hummer vs Helicopter

Hello AD-Edge,

I have played the game together with my younger brother (who also plays Crysis and Heroes of Might and Magic) .

Be prepared because we like to tell people why some games suck. Well, actually I like to tell people why a lot of games suck.

We have to tell you that we can’t call this game finished. Mainly because of balancing issues.

GameplayOverall it is OK. I wonder if the others played with two players because that is when you will notice some balancing issues. The helicopter is in fact doomed to loose in most cases. It is hard to aim with it because it is hard to rotate the helicopter and it is hard to see where the missles will hit and I can barely see where my bullets will hit because the helicopter is flying in front of the bullets most of the time.

The helicopter uses up a lot of fuel, a bit too much fuel in my opinion.

The hummer can last a lot longer and can avoid enemy rockets easily since they will barely hit the target. When they do hit the hummer it suddenly twirls in the air like if it doesn’t weight even a bit. It made us laugh but it is a weight problem that is to be taken serious. The hummer also flips really fast giving the helicopter more chance to damage it. However I missed the hummer most of the time because I couldn’t exactly determ where the missiles/bullets would hit.

The hummer’s gun’s bullets are not actually coming out of the gun but are created above the gun which confuses the player and takes some time to get used to.

GraphicsCould have been better. They look fair from the helicopter’s viewpoint but the hummer sees ugly over-sized textures. A higher texture resolution can really make this game look better.

The lighting is not as good as I hoped. It looks ugly on the player models and it looks like the terrain isn’t affected by it at all.

SoundI shouldn’t review this because I would be a real bastard if I did.

CopyrightDid you release it under GPL on purpose?

That was my review. Thanks for reading it. I hope you’ll work on the issues I described in my review.

Gameplay: 7.8 out of 10

Graphics: 5.7 out of 10

Sound: 4.6 out of 10

Final rating: 6.0

AniCator

PS: For the people that read my review, AD-Edge is aware of the fact I was writing a review that pointed out a lot of the issues. Have fun playing the game.

Thanks for the review AniCator.

I realize the game isnt perfect, and by saying that its finished in this case doesnt mean it perfect. (it just means ive had enough of it, and need to move on to other projects)

Its definatly not made to be compared to Crysis or any other modern game like that. Bit unfair.

Yes thats true, but have you tryed the second view for the helicopter? (middle mouse button, or scrool wheel pressed down). That is a much better view for shooting, it even has a crosshair (which isnt that good, ill admit that)

Also remeber to get the other view in the hummer press C, which helps for aiming with the hummer.

After a lot of tweaking i found that turing the gravity down helped the helicopter fly smoother, which does effect the way the hummer flys into the air, but can make some pretty impressive moments, as the hummer flys through the air after taking a direct hit from a rocket. Its unrealistic, but realism wasnt a main aim in this game.

Lol, originally there wasnt any sound in the game at all, i added a few just for the effect, but didnt pay much attention. So yes, i know its terrible. I usually just play it with the sound off anyway. :yes:

I dont remeber releasing it under any license.

Ive just posted the .exe her for others to play, and leave feedback.

My final note - Ive played a lot against friends at uni, and my brother. After getting used to the controls for both the helicopter and hummer ive found it to be pretty evenly matched, perhaps slightly weighted in favor of the hummer (the helicopter can be quite vulnerable at times), but overall the battles ive had are usually quite close. Especially when health packs are floating around, ive had battles that have lasted over 20 minutes.

Thanks for the feedback though AniCator, its good to get as many reviews on these things, it just means the next game i make can be better (hopefully with better sfx):yes:
